AppPush.Title: Welcome to Collapse Launcher
AppPush.Message: Now you can install or migrate your existing game here. For more information/guides, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/Wiki

AppPush.Title: You are using Preview build
AppPush.Message: You're using preview build and might be unstable. To report any issues, please visit: https://github.com/neon-nyan/CollapseLauncher/issues

RegionPush.Title: Update Cache is Temporarily Unavailable
RegionPush.Message: We are sorry to announce you that the Update Cache feature will be temporarily unavailable due to emergency maintenance on Hi3Mirror Service. The feature will be back in couple of hours.

RegionPush.Title: Update Cache is Temporarily Unavailable
RegionPush.Message: We are sorry to announce you that the Update Cache feature will be temporarily unavailable due to emergency maintenance on Hi3Mirror Service. The feature will be back in couple of hours.

RegionPush.Title: Important Announcement Regarding to Genshin 2.8 Update Issue
RegionPush.Message: We would like to announce you that due to changes on Genshin's Dispatcher data structure, the repair mechanism on Collapse Launcher will be unusable in the next 1.0.33.3 and will be released in the next 1-2 hours (17:00 - 18:00 GMT+7). This also will fix the issue on update mechanism on Genshin (at least for now) that causing the failure. Thank you for your attention and apologize for the inconvenience.
